snippet.title: "Dot Piece Puzzle" on Steam 1st PV short ver.
snippet.description:
#DotPiecePuzzle #Puzzle #neon_Hiyori

Combine Dot Pieces to complete Puzzles!
Solve puzzles featuring adorable pixel art of animals, food, and more.
Collect all the cute pixel art puzzles!

New mode: "Kurayami" mode for experienced players! (exclusive to the Steam version)


"Dot Piece Puzzle" Official website: https://hiyori-prd.com/dpp/en
neon Hiyori Official X: https://x.com/neon_Hiyori_ENG
Hiyori Inc. Official website: https://hiyori-prd.com/en/
